comment: Idempotence of the "n-locally" predicate, i.e. being "n-locally ` A ` " is a local property. (Use ~ loclly to show ` N-Locally N-Locally A = N-Locally A ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)
